functions.name: Get holders of a ERC20 token
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific ERC20 token

args.name: contractAddress
args.description: The address of the ERC20 token contract

functions.name: Get holders of a ERC721 token
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific NFT (ERC721 token) contract

args.name: contractAddress
args.description: The address of the NFT contract
